title: Spoken Arts horror & sci-fi audio collection (MP3 320kbps)
description:
Spoken Arts produced a series of superb renditions of several classic novels. I was only concerned with the horror/sci-fi genres, as those are the only ones I listened to.

The company is, unfortunately, defunct, and there is virtually zero information about them to be found.

It took me literally months to track down any information I could in order to reacquire these long lost stories I listened to as a child. Apparently, the master tapes have been absorbed into the Yale University Library, with no plans of releasing them in the foreseeable future.

After 7 years of searching, I was able to get my hands on the 5 stories I was looking for from Spoken Arts on cassette tape. I have transferred the stories to digital, and tried to improve the quality as much as I could from a poor, low bias tape source.

The stories in the collection are:

DRACULA
FRANKENSTEIN
THE STRANGE CASE OF DR. JEKYLL AND MR. HYDE
THE TIME MACHINE
20,000 LEAGUES UNDER THE SEA

Please enjoy these wonderful renditions of these classic stories!
